channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for PR

item.title: Report E-2023100604
item.description:
Report E-2023100604

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-26T15:12:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-21
  • City: AGUADILLA
  • State: PR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PETRO AIR, CORP
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The driver of the truck was traveling on highway #110 at Km 30.5 jurisdiction of Bo. Avocado from the municipality of Aguadilla. It was transporting 11,000.00 gallons of Jet Fuel, soon to reach its destination the truck crashed, overturning the truck and tank, causing a spill, an estimated jet fuel loss of 1,540 gallons on the ground. state agencies were activated for emergency management; Environmental Quality Board, Puerto Rico Police, Firefighters, Transportation Bureau and Other public services and Environmental Emergency cleaning company to clean the area impacted by the spill. Industrial cranes were required to lift the tank and truck. The product left the truck through the blind cover on the tank due to the pressure that the product exerted on it. The estimated time to complete the work of moving the truck and tank from the accident site was 6 hours. The immediate activation of the resources that manage emergencies and the actions of the personnel who work with the management of the containment and cleaning of the hazardous material, ensured that the impact was controlled.
